Take:         [0, 1, 2]
Source:
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| Column 0 | Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 | Column 4 |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| 1        | 2        | 1        | 4        | "x1"     |
| 2        | 2        | 2        | 4        | "x2"     |
| 3        | 2        | 3        | 4        | "x3"     |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
Result:
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| Column 0 | Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 | Column 4 |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| 1        | 2        | 1        | 4        | "x1"     |
| 2        | 2        | 2        | 4        | "x2"     |
| 3        | 2        | 3        | 4        | "x3"     |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
